html: How can Congress and the Courts hold the White House accountable? Join @RepHuffman, ACS President @crfredrickson, and @sfchronicle Editor-in-Chief @audreycoopersf as they discuss these issues. RSVP here: https://buff.ly/2NqYmFn pic.twitter.com/MNGvUI0O2O
text:

text:
On Fridays, @GOPLeader & I normally speak on the Floor about the schedule for the week ahead.

It’s time to let the People’s House work its will & #ProtectDREAMers.pic.twitter.com/uBHrGlqGGP
